scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of one scrapbook about the Crescendo Club, a women's glee club formed by Avrid Samuelson in 1928. This scrapbook was compiled by member Bertha Doris Fee and extensively annotated by club historians Gertrude E. Carlson and Myra L. Streeter. The scrapbook includes concert announcements, programs, the organization's consitution, and newspaper clippings documenting the perfromance season of the club. This collection also a small number of loose items, including additional performance programs and clippings, as well as a newsletter.
